attributes.title: terrible quality
attributes.review: the worst app i have ever tried to use😤😤 constantly glitches and was not helpful at all! i would barely even get on it and it would freeze up or exit out. DO NOT GET IT IT IS NOT WORTH YOUR TIME!!

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: I had high expectations considering MY PRESIDENT is in charge of it, but I was very disappointed. Every 5 seconds it would glitch and yell the words “China!” I WAS IN PUBLIC. Now there’s nothing wrong with China, but I didn’t like the constant yelling and glitching. Unacceptable.😤

attributes.title: This is unacceptable
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app I thought it was gonna be videos about the annoying orange. When I opened the app it didn’t even start playing I rate a 0 if I could

attributes.title: Don’t download this app 😡😡
attributes.review: I hate this app is has created a big glitch in my phone and had to get it fixed and I am never downloading this app ever again plus I don’t even like trump BLM✊🏿✊🏽✊🏾 period 💅don’t download this app!!!!!!!!🤬🤬🤬😡😡

attributes.title: Black lives matter✊🏾
attributes.review: This is a TERRIBLE app and the person that made it should be in jail☺️ it makes my phone glitch with pictures of an orangutan with a hair piece on. I recommend you not download😘

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: I would hate for people to vote for trump in 2020 I mean all he done mess things up.. I mean we almost had world war 3.. and not to mention that he is racist... I hope 2020 we get a new president that treat us right and fairly

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: Almost got executed by this app, downloaded it, and was about to not vote until I got surrounded by oranges canting “VOTE TRUMP 2020 OR HIT THE CHAIR” I wasn’t going down without a fight so I fled the scene and had to burn down my own house. What a waste of time. Don’t get this app. Awful and exhausting😫😫

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app keeps your location even when you’re not using it. Also, when I opened the app, my IQ lowered immediately! Do not use this app if you want to keep your intelligence.

attributes.title: Horrible app😡
attributes.review: This app made my phone lag like crazy. It sends constant notifications that don’t help. It has a very stupid point to exist in the first place and the whole thing is just trash 🙃

attributes.title: yeah no❤️
attributes.review: my friend recommended this app to me because i love fake news and it gave me a lot of viruses on  my phone🦠🦠🦠!!! worst app ever 🤢🤢 i am scared to go to sleep at night now. trump sent aliens to my house and they stole my chickens😔 i am very sad now that i am alone. PLEASE DO NOT USE THE APP !!!!
